metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32434 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
abcm2ps v8.14.11 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read in the function calculate_beam at draw.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 8.14.13-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.14.13-2').
